title: Game looking really blurry (Visual bug?)

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: So this has been going on for a while, I dont know when exactly it started to happen beacue it didnt bother me much, but after the visual update to HP bars etc. , it's been putting me in a disadvantage due to me not being able to see the health bars of minions clearly nor patience bars of jungle monsters. Also the HUD, champion levels etc. have been looking really blurry. Screenshots in the imgur link.

replies.body: This is a weird case and I'm thinking of two potential cases causing this.  The first is likely bad game files causing this kind of blur.  If you haven't already try a repair or reinstall with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Double check your drivers as well and make sure they're up to date to help smooth things out, our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help with that.

Repaired the game, installed the drivers (well ''partially'') and it still does happen. ALSO, what I should've said is that, it does not happen every single game, it happens somewhat frequent but it doesn't have a particular order  in which it happens or any particular number of games. 

Anyways, the drivers are perhaps the problem, I've been trying to install them since yesterday, I don't get past the ''partially installed'' message after the installation. My drivers are kind of hard to download since I can't really find any specifics about my graphics card, it's AMD Radeon(TM) R5 Graphics, but that's about it. 

So if there's anything else you would suggest besides those two, please do.
